snippet.title: Snow Cone Serenade - Trailer
snippet.description:
A mysterious cold spell traps you in your cozy home. Your old dog Jedediah is sick and to top it all off, the heating suddenly breaks! Will you dare to enter a cursed world to fix it?

A short and sweet blend of Adventure and CRPG. 

Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2784660/Snow_Cone_Serenade/

Or get it now on itch, for free:

https://potion-of-midi.itch.io/snow-cone-serenade

Let's hang:
https://twitter.com/PotionOfMidi
https://potion-of-midi.itch.io
https://midipotion.bandcamp.com/
